caller_intent: The caller (mother of Nicole or Gabriel Sorico) aimed to confirm the correct address and apartment number for an insurance-related note that had been returned, ensuring it is updated in the system.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's identity as the parent of Nicole or Gabriel Sorico.
Agent provided the current address on file (151 Kimberly Drive, Boone, NC 28607) and asked about an apartment number.
Caller confirmed the apartment number was '7' after a brief delay in retrieving the information.
Agent assured the caller the address would be updated in the system and the note resent.
knowledge_required: Process for updating client address information in insurance systems
Handling returned mail/notes and resending them after corrections
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance Services internal database/Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system
summary: An agent from Alliance Insurance Services contacted the parent of Nicole or Gabriel Sorico to verify an address and apartment number for a returned insurance note. After confirming the apartment number was '7', the agent committed to updating the system and resending the note. The call concluded with the caller expressing gratitude.
